Do you agree or disagree\".","ch":[{"content":"opinion：agree"},{"content":"reason：在没有完成学业前，大多数人都是经济不独立的，这个时间节点结婚的话是很难维系家庭的。"}],"k":["married"]}

{"id":"58ff5799ac502e0063bf947d","sn":529,"u":1514190667926,"c":1493129113335,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Extreme / adventure sports","te":"Extreme sports like skiing, water rafting etc. are dangerous and should these be banned","ch":[{"content":"pro：极限运动可以给人们带来其它运动带不来的乐趣，给人们成就感。"},{"content":"con：极限运动会危急人们的生命安全"}],"k":["Extreme","sports"]}

{"id":"59f045a4570c35004582d370","sn":1745,"u":1514190665812,"c":1508918692286,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Global Problems","te":"Global problems related to governments and international organisations, what are the problems and what is your opinion? ","ch":[{"content":"problems：人类活动对自然环境的破坏 e.g. climate change"},{"content":"opinion： 各国之前签署公约 e.g. 《联合国气候变化框架公约》于1992年6月4日在巴西里约热内卢举行的联合国环发大会上通过。"}],"k":["Global","problems"]}

{"id":"595b87bc8d6d81005700f82d","sn":1363,"u":1514190664261,"c":1499170748328,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"The mass media","te":"The mass media including TV, Radio and newspaper influence our society and shape our opinions and characters. What is your opinion? ","ch":[{"content":"opinion 1：大众媒体会左右人们的价值判断 e.g. 希特勒利用媒体加深德国人民对纳粹人民的憎恨，从而煽动战争情绪。"},{"content":"opinion 2：大众媒体会影响人们的行为 e.g. 宣传广告的轰炸会影响消费者的购买行为"}],"k":["media"]}

{"id":"59f02fd0128fe10045fff14d","sn":1742,"u":1514190662036,"c":1508913104214,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Formal Written Assessment","te":"Using formal written assessment is still a valid task. {"id":"58ff4815a22b9d0065b512ba","sn":470,"u":1514190660454,"c":1493125141200,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Climate change","te":"You need to study climate change. Which aspect of climate change will you choose and why? Use examples.","ch":[{"content":"climate change：全球温度升高"},{"content":"reason：全球温度升高造成了许多恶劣影响。e.g. 大量物种灭绝。海平面上升。"}],"k":["climate","change"]}

{"id":"58ff57085c497d005813120e","sn":527,"u":1514190656704,"c":1493128968252,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Travel","te":"Some people believe one can be brilliant without leaving their local areas. To what extent do you think travel should be a component to improve education quality?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：travel可以更有广度和深度的帮人学习"},{"content":"reason 1：travel是一个很好的契机，让人们与自己不会主动去接触的知识邂逅，这可以扩宽人们的知识广度。e.g. 到名胜古迹旅游，了解到历史知识。"},{"content":"reason 2：travel可以给人更直观的体验，激发对知识的兴趣，更深入的理解掌握知识。"}],"k":["education","quality"]}

{"id":"58ff4cf8da2f60005dd75f50","sn":493,"u":1514190655269,"c":1493126392356,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Climate change","te":"Write about Climate change. Who is responsible whether Government or industries? Why?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：industries"},{"content":"reason：治理环境的费用应该主要由industries承担，应该算入产品的成本中。"}],"k":["industries"]}

{"id":"595b757b128fe100585d2731","sn":1360,"u":1514190651455,"c":1499166075043,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Greatest inventions","te":"What are the greatest inventions of the 20th century among medicine, airplane and computers, why? ","ch":[{"content":"computers"},{"content":"reason：电脑是信息革命的最重要的工具之一，推动了过去几十年各行各业的技术发展，同时在未来的发展中，也扮演着不可或缺的角色。"}],"k":["inventions"]}

{"id":"58ff4b3ada2f60005dd75082","sn":483,"u":1514190625789,"c":1493125946184,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Company's top-level authorities","te":"Company's top-level authorities should get their employees in decision-making process. ","ch":[{"content":"opinion：on reputation"},{"content":"reason：食物衣服等日用品是存量市场，服务好客户就可以有更好的reputation，可以有更多的回头客。"}],"k":["marketing"]}

","ch":[{"content":"opinion: disagree."},{"content":"reason: 未来问题不解决的话可能会发展成更严重的问题。（就像口袋妖怪中，如果火箭队一开始就派主力来抓皮卡丘 就不会给小智打怪升级的机会了【滑稽表情】考试的时候请不要当作例子）"}],"k":["funding"]}

{"id":"58ff561544d9040069fb5b64","sn":521,"u":1514190427155,"c":1493128725941,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Advent of Internet","te":"Does the advent of Internet change the role of teacher? {"id":"58ff5384da2f60005dd795c1","sn":507,"u":1514190427003,"c":1493128068275,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Communication","te":"Communication has changed significantly in the last 10 years Discuss pros and cons impacts.","ch":[{"content":"pro：更多种方便快捷的communication方式被发明出来 e.g. 手机，social media."},{"content":"con：新型communication在一定程度上让人们变得孤独封闭"}],"k":["Communication"]}

{"id":"58ff5731da2f60005dd7b2ad","sn":528,"u":1514190426802,"c":1493129009342,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Educational purpose","te":"Some people think educational purpose is to have a better life in the future; others argue that its aim is only for a self-improvement. What is your opinion? Your essay should base on your own experiences and examples.","ch":[{"content":"opinion：self-improvement"},{"content":"reason：教育可大体分为技能学习和认知学习，技能学习会直观的授你一技之长，可以作为吃饭的饭碗，而认知的学习会根本的改变一个人的三观，认知的升级可以根本上让自己完成升华。"}],"k":["educational","purpose"]}

{"id":"58ff56e561ff4b00667b0da1","sn":526,"u":1514190426564,"c":1493128933275,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Cultural shock","te":"Cultural shock is a new worry concern for less immigration. What are the possible opinions to eradicate this issue?","ch":[{"content":"opinion 1：多渠道，全方位了解当地文化，习俗。"},{"content":"opinion 2：主动与当地人交朋友，尽快融入当地人的圈子。"}],"k":["Cultural","shock"]}

{"id":"58ff566861ff4b00667b09f9","sn":523,"u":1514190426342,"c":1493128808831,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"No need of newspapers","te":"There is no need of newspapers in modern world. {"id":"58ff563dac502e0063bf8a14","sn":522,"u":1514190426180,"c":1493128765840,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Competitive environment","te":"A competitive environment in school and university would bring excellence and need to be encouraged. Agree or disagree?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：agree"},{"content":"reason：竞争可以激起多数同学的热情，能激发他们的潜力，同时也能为步入现实社会做准备。"}],"k":["competitive","environment"]}

{"id":"58ff55b6a0bb9f0065d43043","sn":519,"u":1514190426048,"c":1493128630256,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Car","te":"Some people suggest that each family should only have one car and encourage alternative vehicle. Do you agree?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：agree"},{"content":"reason：每家太多车会造成车辆闲置，资源浪费。"},{"content":"reason：新能源车可以减少化石能源燃烧所造成的空气污染。"}],"k":["car"]}

{"id":"58ff552d0ce4630061427399","sn":516,"u":1514190425882,"c":1493128493091,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Motivation and practice","te":"With enough amounts of motivation and practice, people can learn anything that the experts teach in the classroom. Agree or not.","ch":[{"content":"opinion：disagree"},{"content":"reason：太复杂的，不适合当前学生年龄段的知识，足够的鼓励和练习也很难让学生掌握"}],"k":["motivation","practice"]}

{"id":"58ff528961ff4b00667aea6d","sn":501,"u":1514190425722,"c":1493127817388,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Environment","te":"The environment we live in is in danger due to various problems. What are the underlying causes? Who is responsible to combat this? What measures?","ch":[{"content":"causes：人类活动"},{"content":"responsible：政府和人民"},{"content":"measures：政府出台法令治理环境。 人民积极响应，保护环境从每个人做起。"}],"k":["environment"]}

{"id":"58ff51f0ac502e0063bf679b","sn":498,"u":1514190425578,"c":1493127664144,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Industrial revolution","te":"Do you believe that industrial revolution was the main factor for problems in developed nation?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：no"},{"content":"reason：工业革命确实带来了一些问题e.g.环境污染，但它给整个人类社会带来了更多积极的影响，很大程度的提高了人们的生产力。"}],"k":["industrial","revolution"]}

{"id":"58ff4c63b123db260cb72911","sn":490,"u":1514190425409,"c":1493126243298,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Parents","te":"Parents should be held legally responsible for their children's acts. What is your opinion? Support it with personal examples...","ch":[{"content":"opinion：agree"},{"content":"reason：孩子在没有能力对自己的行动负责的时候，父母作为孩子的监护人有义务替孩子承担责任，因为这可以让社会成本最小化。"}],"k":["childrens","acts"]}

{"id":"58ff4bfeac502e0063bf306b","sn":488,"u":1514190425234,"c":1493126142671,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Packaged products","te":"Do you think consumer should avoid over-packaged products or it is responsibility of producer to avoid extra packaging of products? Give your views or any relevant example with your own experience.","ch":[{"content":"opinion：过度包装是生产商的责任"},{"content":"reason：过度包装往往是因为生产商为了商品的营销的主动行为，只有商家的观念转变，才能减少过度包装这种现象。"}],"k":["over","packaged"]}

{"id":"58ff4bb00ce4630061421f1d","sn":486,"u":1514190425054,"c":1493126064509,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Large shopping malls","te":"Large shopping malls are replacing small shops. What is your opinion about this? Discuss with appropriate examples.","ch":[{"content":"opinion：disagree"},{"content":"opinion：large shopping mall和small shops的定位不一样，large shopping mall虽然东西普遍便宜，但是不可能完全取代small shops。因为small shops给所服务的当地居民的便利，是large shopping mall 给不了的。"}],"k":["shopping"]}

{"id":"58ff4b64da2f60005dd75195","sn":484,"u":1514190331033,"c":1493125988840,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Voting","te":"\"In some countries around the world, voting is compulsory. Do you agree with the notion of compulsory voting?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：disagree"},{"content":"reason：投票是民主社会的标志，如果强制投票，民主就变了味道。"}],"k":["compulsory"]}

{"id":"58ff4c2e5c497d005812b620","sn":489,"u":1514190330572,"c":1493126190728,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Work","te":"Nowadays, people spend too much time at work to the extent that they hardly have time for their personal life. Discuss.","ch":[{"content":"opinion：agree"},{"content":"reason：现代社会的竞争越来越激烈，给人们带来了恐慌，很多人都选择拼命工作来让自己感到安心，这就缩减了娱乐时间。"}],"k":["extent"]}

{"id":"58ff539fa0bb9f0065d41b3f","sn":508,"u":1514190329187,"c":1493128095859,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Illiterate","te":"The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn. Agree or Disagree?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：agree"},{"content":"reason：教育普及率越来越高，传统意义上的文盲人群在减少。"},{"content":"reason：知识爆炸，新鲜事物越来越多，如果没有学习能力，在现代世界很难高质量生活。"}],"k":["illiterate"]}

{"id":"58ff55e21b69e60058ae1415","sn":520,"u":1514190328433,"c":1493128674430,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"Repetitive routine","te":"Some effective people like repetitive routine, such as eating the same food, do you like this way ?","ch":[{"content":"opinion：don't like."},{"content":"reason：缺少了品尝各种食物的乐趣。"},{"content":"reason：营养单一，对人们的健康有危害。"}],"k":["repetitive","routine"]}

{"id":"58ff4ab98d6d810058a8ba56","sn":480,"u":1514190327557,"c":1493125817624,"p":"WE","t":"Writing","q":"New language","te":"Learning a new language at an early age is helpful for children. Is it more positive for their future aspect or have some adverse effects?","ch":[{"content":"positive impacts：早期语言学习可以刺激儿童大脑生长，提高智力，同时也能让孩子对这门语音有更扎实的掌握。"},{"content":"negative impacts：如果过于push孩子去过早学习，可能会对孩子的心里造成影响。"}],"k":["adverse"]}
